Description:
Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that the local exhaust ventilation plant, namely the Nederman unit (serial no. 663), provided to prevent or control exposure to substances which are hazardous to health, namely welding fume, has been thoroughly examined and tested by a competent person in the last 14 months.

Prohibition Notice served,

You have failed to adequately guard the dangerous parts of the Radial Arm Drill to prevent entanglement.
